languages.text: "Пусть он и его люди искупят свою вину кровью".
"Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."
languages.original_text: "Пусть он и его люди искупят свою вину кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Let him and his people atone with their blood."
"Let him and his people atone with their blood."
"Let him and his people atone with their blood."
"Let him and his people atone with their blood."
"Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."
"Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

languages.text: “让他和他的手下用鲜血来赎罪吧，以帝皇的名义。”
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: “让他和他的手下用血肉来赎罪吧。”

languages.text: 「皇帝の名の下に、彼とその民には血で償ってもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の名の下に、彼とその民には血で償ってもらおう」

languages.text: «Que él y su pueblo expíen sus pecados derramando su sangre en nombre del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: «Que él y su pueblo expíen con su sangre».

languages.text: "Lasst ihn und seine Leute büßen, indem im Namen des Imperators Blut vergossen wird."
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst ihn und seine Leute durch ihr Blut Buße tun."

languages.text: « Que ses complices et lui expient leurs crimes en faisant couler le sang au nom de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: « Que ses complices et lui expient leurs crimes par le sang. »

languages.text: "O ve adamları, suçlarının bedelini İmparator adına kan dökerek ödesinler."
languages.original_text: "Let him and his people atone by shedding blood in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: "O ve çevresindekiler, suçlarının bedelini İmparator adına kan dökerek ödesinler."
